snippet.title: Risk of Rain - Gameplay Trailer | PS4, PS Vita
snippet.description: Risk of Rain is an action platformer with roguelike elements. With permanent death as a primary feature, players will have to play their best to get as far as possible. Fight on a mysterious planet with randomly spawning enemies and bosses, either alone or with 3 friends in online and local co-op.
